languages.text: "Может, у тебя и получится. А может, тебя ждет славная смерть. И в обоих случаях хотел бы я быть рядом с тобой в этот момент. По рукам".
"Maybe you will succeed. Or maybe you will meet a glorious end. Whatever happens, I want to be at your side at that moment. I'm in."
languages.original_text: "Может, у тебя и получится. А может, тебя ждет славная смерть. И в обоих случаях хотел бы я быть рядом с тобой в этот момент. По рукам".

traits.locale_text: "Maybe you will succeed. Or maybe you will meet a glorious death. Whatever happens, I want to be at your side in that moment. I'm in."
"Maybe you will succeed. Or maybe you will meet a glorious death. Whatever happens, I want to be at your side in that moment. I'm in."
"Maybe you will succeed. Or maybe you will meet a glorious end. Whatever happens, I want to be at your side at that moment. I'm in."
"Maybe you will succeed. Or maybe you will meet a glorious end. Whatever happens, I want to be at your side at that moment. I'm in."
"Maybe you will succeed. Or maybe you will meet a glorious end. Whatever happens, I want to be at your side at that moment. I'm in."
"Maybe you will succeed. Or maybe you will meet a glorious end. Whatever happens, I want to be at your side at that moment. I'm in."

languages.text: « Peut-être que vous y arriverez. Ou peut-être que vous succomberez avec gloire. Quoi qu'il arrive, je veux être à vos côtés à ce moment-là. J'accepte votre proposition. »
languages.original_text: "Maybe you will succeed. Or maybe you will meet a glorious end. Whatever happens, I want to be at your side at that moment. I'm in."

traits.locale_text: « Peut-être que vous y arriverez. Ou peut-être que vous succomberez avec gloire. Quoi qu'il arrive, je veux être à vos côtés à ce moment-là. J'accepte votre proposition. »

languages.text: “或许你会成功，或许你会光荣战死。无论是哪种结局，我都想陪着你走到最后。算我一个吧。”
languages.original_text: "Maybe you will succeed. Or maybe you will meet a glorious end. Whatever happens, I want to be at your side at that moment. I'm in."

traits.locale_text: “或许你会成功，或许你会光荣战死。无论是哪种结局，我都想陪着你走到最后。算我一个吧。”

languages.text: 「お前は成し遂げるかもしれんし、あるいは栄光の最期を遂げるかもしれない。何が起こるにせよ、俺はその時、お前の側にいたいのだ。だから参加する」
languages.original_text: "Maybe you will succeed. Or maybe you will meet a glorious end. Whatever happens, I want to be at your side at that moment. I'm in."

traits.locale_text: 「お前は成し遂げるかもしれんし、あるいは栄光の最期を遂げるかもしれない。何が起こるにせよ、俺はその時、お前の側にいたいのだ。だから参加する」

languages.text: "Vielleicht schafft Ihr es. Vielleicht findet Ihr auch Euer ruhmreiches Ende. Was auch geschieht, ich möchte dabei an Eurer Seite sein. Ich bin dabei."
languages.original_text: "Maybe you will succeed. Or maybe you will meet a glorious end. Whatever happens, I want to be at your side at that moment. I'm in."

traits.locale_text: "Vielleicht schafft Ihr es. Vielleicht findet Ihr auch Euer ruhmreiches Ende. Was auch geschieht, ich möchte dabei an Eurer Seite sein. Ich bin dabei."

languages.text: «Quizá lo consiga. O quizá encuentre una muerte gloriosa. En ambos casos me gustaría estar a tu lado en ese momento. Iré».
languages.original_text: "Maybe you will succeed. Or maybe you will meet a glorious end. Whatever happens, I want to be at your side at that moment. I'm in."

traits.locale_text: «Quizá lo consiga. O quizá encuentre una muerte gloriosa. En ambos casos me gustaría estar a tu lado en ese momento. Iré».

languages.text: "Belki başarırsın. Belki de şanlı bir ölüme kavuşursun. Her ne olursa olsun o an yanında olmak istiyorum. Teklifini kabul ediyorum."
languages.original_text: "Maybe you will succeed. Or maybe you will meet a glorious end. Whatever happens, I want to be at your side at that moment. I'm in."

traits.locale_text: "Belki başarırsın. Belki de şanlı bir ölüme kavuşursun. Her ne olursa olsun o an yanında olmak istiyorum. Teklifini kabul ediyorum."
